name: ProjectUNO
description:
SYNOPSIS:

Blackstone Mine is under attack by the monsters, a group three intrepid adventurers have been tasked to eliminate the said monsters & save the miners within.

GAMEPLAY:

  • Classic turn-based JRPG battles.
  • Classic JRPG inspired graphics.
  • Classic JRPG top-down view.
  • Classic RPG weapons & armours.
  • 3 levels dungeon with "Boss Battle".
  • Micro RPG Quest.
